Text: A simple question; does this work or not?
Hi anybody can help me with installation...when I run installation it is ok but when I run the program it asks about server or file and I donot know what to do..if somebody can help please
Installation process is fine, but the license file is missing, so doesn't work

To people having problems with license:
You need to run regedit and change the license path data key in
HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Mathsoft\Mathcad 13\FLEXlm
to where mcad13.dat is on your computer.
Hi!where can I find the regedit?and this HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Mathsoft\Mathcad 13\FLEXlm??somebody please help me..i needed your answer a lot.thanks!
